name: Freezerburn
description:
In the game Freezerburn, you play as a robot chef who wields the power of fire and ice. The goal of the game is to put together all the ingredients needed to create the perfect recipe, by gathering an ingredient in each level. Every level has it's own focus, with the first level taking place in a freezer. You traverse a series of platforms to gather the first ingredient. The next level requires you to solve a puzzle in the kitchen to get the second ingredient. In the third level, you must combat against a group of enemies who are trying to steal the final ingredient. Defeat them and combine all the ingredients to make the perfect dish.

The player has unique mechanics that can enhance your movement and make it easier to gather the ingredients. These include:

  • Shooting an ice projectile to enhance your run speed
  • Shooting a fire projectile onto the ice to create a wind tunnel and boost you upwards
  • Hovering in midair to find potential shortcuts and traverse the level

This is the basis of our game Freezerburn, we hope you enjoy it and more updates may come soon in the future!
